definitions.definition: To ally oneself, be in an alliance, usually with "with" or rarely "in with"
definitions.example: Which will you side with, good or evil?

definitions.definition: To be or stand at the side of; to be on the side toward.
To suit; to pair; to match.
To work (a timber or rib) to a certain thickness by trimming the sides.
To provide with, as a side or accompaniment.
